roleset.name: talk idly

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Rivers had some choice words about "The Tonight Show" host Johnny Carson during her chatting with MSNBC about the passing of Ed McMahon.
example.arg: about the passing of Ed McMahon

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry chat.01, OntoNotes grouping sense 1; maps to VN class chit_chat-37.6. Framed by Claire.
